item.title: Mayor Mamdani, fiscal hawk?
item.description: Maybe, just maybe, the socialist is onto something with his government efficiency exercise.

item.title: Scheduling new elections for Venezuela
item.description: Trump has leverage to press Delcy Rodriguez to announce a date.

item.title: Jimmy Carter’s pastor: Let’s rebuild the nation’s locker room
item.description: Jimmy Carter’s pastor and other Post readers on political unrest, Minnesota and abortion policy.

item.title: Meet the bird that can fly 8,000 miles without stopping
item.description: B6, a bar-tailed godwit, offers puffed-up humans a lesson in humility.

item.title: A mysterious delay in the Supreme Court tariffs case
item.description: The Trump administration, though the underdog, will find each passing week an encouraging sign.

item.title: Trump’s pro-coal directives could raise energy prices by billions
item.description: Requiring aging plants to operate after their scheduled closures hurts consumers, who pay the price.

item.title: D.C.’s glacial response to the winter storm
item.description: It’s fair for taxpayers to question why it’s taking so long for the city to recover.

item.title: This pragmatism has a price
item.description: The U.K. traded far more away in its “reset” with China than it gained in trade deals or investment.
